mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bamboo_charge ( charge_no, charger_id, payment_method, payment_amount, charge_bamboo, charge_date, coupon_code ) VALUES ( bamboo_charge_no_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chargerId}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentAmount}, #{chargeBamboo}, SYSDATE, #{couponCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(sum(tr.refund_bamboo),0) FROM talent_refund tr LEFT JOIN bamboo_use bu ON tr.purchase_no = bu.purchase_no WHERE tr.refund_status = '환불완료' AND bu.buyer_id = #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT charge_date, payment_method, payment_amount, charge_bamboo FROM bamboo_charge WHERE charger_id = #{chargerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY charge_date DESC
